attributes.action: Spread awareness about gangs and knife
attributes.additional_details: The campaign will be organised by GCSE Citizenship students at Newham  Sixth Form College and with the help of other students, teachers, staff members and political leaders from borough of Newham, our mission is to educate young people about the consequences of knife crime and gangs.
attributes.background: We are doing a campaign about gangs and knife crime, we are looking to spread awareness about the consequence of knife crime and gangs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like to spread awareness about gangs and knives, but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition about raising knife crime awareness in schools: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232326
